description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Callout component.

contains.description: Specifies the placeholder text displayed when no value is present.
contains.label: Contains

gapSpace.description: The gap space between target and the Callout component.
gapSpace.label: Gap Space

open.description: Specifies whether this Callout component is open.
open.label: Open

targetPosition.description: Specifies the position of the callout, relative to the target component.
targetPosition.label: Target Position
